/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees on both sides, their leaves forming a canopy that filters the sunlight. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is captured in a 360-degree format, providing a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the varied hues of the buildings.
